actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Foreign Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-875.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #106 (294-103).
Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations, S. Rept. 93-793.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #172 (76-9).

official_title: An Act to authorize additional appropriations to carry out the Peace Corps Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes the appropriation for the Peace Corps of not in excess of $1,000,000 for fiscal year 1975 for increases in salary, pay, retirement, or other employee benefits authorized by law. Authorizes the Director of ACTION to transfer to the readjustment allowance, ACTION, account at the Treasury Department from any sums appropriated to carry out the purposes of this Act in fiscal year 1975 not to exceed $315,000 to rectify the imbalance in the Peace Corps readjustment allowance account for the period March 1, 1961, to February 28, 1973. Authorizes the Director of ACTION to waive claims resulting from erroneous payments of readjustment allowances to Peace Corps Volunteers who terminated their volunteer service between March 1, 1961, and February 28, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to authorize additional appropriations to carry out the Peace Corps Act.
An Act to authorize additional appropriations to carry out the Peace Corps Act, and for other purposes.
